title: Mystery Shopper Laptop Gig

subscription.title: Mystery Shopper Laptop Gig
subscription.description:
Description:
For this gig you'll be going to the store to ask a salesperson for advice on a laptop. Please go to the area of the store, called Apple Shop, which displays only Apple Products.  During your visit, please follow the shopper training manual for what you should do during this gig.

Details - In order to get paid you will need to complete the following:
  • Take a clear and well framed photo of the storefront
  • Answer all questions regarding your visit and interactions with the staff to the best of your ability

Remember - When you talk to the salesperson do not mention any brand and do not mention that you are mystery shopping.

questions.question_text: Take a clear and well-framed photo of the storefront; include what is to the left and right of the store if possible.  If the store is located in a mall, take a photo of the mall outside.  Do not take photos inside the store
What is your age?
What is your gender?
Time In of Evaluation
Time Out of Evaluation
If you received service from more than one salesperson, provide the name and description of the salesperson who discussed or showed Apple product features.
Salesperson Gender
Salesperson Name
Salesperson Description
For all other questions in the survey, do not refer to the salesperson by name or gender; use only gender-neutral description (such as they, their, or salesperson).
When you first started your interaction with the salesperson, what product did you say you were looking for?
Answer these questions based on your observations of the area of the store that displays Apple products only, including counts of customers and salespeople.
How many customers were in the Apple Shop when you arrived?  Include yourself in the count, so number must be 1 or greater.
Please specify how you received service.
If there were no salespeople in the Apple Shop, which of the following best describes how you received service?
propositions: A salesperson came to the Apple Shop to assist me.
I left the Apple Shop to find a salesperson.

questions.question_text: Please describe what the salespeople were doing in the Apple shop when you arrived.
What were salespeople doing in the Apple Shop when you arrived?  Select all that apply.
How many salespeople were in the Apple Shop when you arrived?
How long did you have to wait to receive service in the Apple Shop?  Time from the moment you arrived at the Apple Shop until you received service from a salesperson.
How long did you have to wait to receive service in the Apple Shop?  Time from the moment you arrived at the Apple Shop until you received service from a salesperson.
Did a salesperson acknowledge you within 4 minutes of arriving at the Apple Shop?  Acknowledgement can be a gesture, a comment, or an offer of assistance.
What other question(s) were asked to determine which product would best suit your needs?

During the interaction, what questions did the salesperson ask to determine which product would best meet your needs? Select all that apply. If the salesperson did not ask any questions, select only the last option, “None - did not ask any questions.”
propositions: General question(s) on how I would use the product
Where I would use the product: home, office, on the go, etc.
If anyone else would use the product: family, friends, etc.
Questions about my work, studies or hobbies
Questions about specific uses, such as email, Internet, photos, etc.
How I use other technology, such as current computer or smartphone
What type of computer I use (Apple Mac or Windows PC)
If I own any other Apple products (iPod, iPhone, or iPad)
How much money I want to spend
How many files, photos, or music I need to store
What processor or memory capacity I need
If I prefer a certain screen size
None, did not ask any questions

$eq: General question(s) on how I would use the product
Where I would use the product: home, office, on the go, etc.
If anyone else would use the product: family, friends, etc.
Questions about my work, studies or hobbies
Questions about specific uses, such as email, Internet, photos, etc.
How I use other technology, such as current computer or smartphone
What type of computer I use (Apple Mac or Windows PC)
If I own any other Apple products (iPod, iPhone, or iPad)
How much money I want to spend
How many files, photos, or music I need to store
What processor or memory capacity I need
If I prefer a certain screen size
None, did not ask any questions

questions.question_text: Explain what happened instead.
When you stated your interest in a laptop, did the salesperson respond by asking you questions about your product needs?
propositions: Yes – the salesperson asked me questions about my needs.
No – I had to volunteer my needs to continue the conversation.

$eq: Yes – the salesperson asked me questions about my needs.
No – I had to volunteer my needs to continue the conversation.

questions.question_text: Describe the beginning of your interaction with the salesperson. How did the salesperson respond when you stated your interest in a laptop?
Which MacBook Pro model did the salesperson recommend or mention positively first?
propositions: MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID (newest generation)
MacBook Pro without Touch Bar and Touch ID (newest generation)

questions.question_text: Which iPhone model did the salesperson recommend or mention positively first?
Specify the manufacturer and product type of the “Other brand (NOT Apple)” recommended by the salesperson.

You indicated that the salesperson did not recommend an Apple laptop, even after you specifically asked about one. What did the salesperson say in response to your request for information on an Apple laptop?

Which of the following did the salesperson mention when explaining why the recommended Apple product would be the best option for you?
Select all that apply. If "None", select only the last option.
propositions: Post on social media sites like Facebook, Twitter, etc.
None of the above / no Apple product presented

questions.question_text: Which MacBook Pro models did the salesperson recommend?  Select all that apply.
propositions: MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID (newest generation)
MacBook Pro without Touch Bar and Touch ID (newest generation)

questions.question_text: What other iPhone models did the salesperson recommend?  Select all that apply.
Specify the manufacturer and product type of the “Other brand (NOT Apple)” recommended by the salesperson.

What other products did the salesperson recommend? Select all that apply. Do not include product accessories in this question.
If the salesperson did not recommend any other products, select only the last option “Did not get other recommendations”
propositions: Other brand (NOT Apple), please specify manufacturer and product type:

questions.question_text:
Which of the following did the salesperson mention when explaining why the recommended Apple product would be the best option for you?
Select all that apply. If "None", select only the last option.
propositions: Post on social media sites like Facebook, Twitter, etc.
None of the above / no Apple product presented

questions.question_text: Describe what the salesperson said when they made the Apple product recommendation. What did they say about the product and how it meets your needs?

propositions: MacBook Pro with Touch Bar and Touch ID (newest generation)
MacBook Pro without Touch Bar and Touch ID (newest generation)

If the salesperson did not recommend any other products, select only the last option “Did not get other recommendations”
propositions: Other brand (NOT Apple), please specify manufacturer and product type:

questions.question_text: Describe what the salesperson said when they made the Apple product recommendation. What did they say about the product and how it meets your needs?

What other products did the salesperson recommend? Select all that apply. Do not include product accessories in this question.
If the salesperson did not recommend any other products, select only the last option “Did not get other recommendations”
propositions: Other brand (NOT Apple), please specify manufacturer and product type:

questions.question_text: Which product did the salesperson recommend or mention positively FIRST?
propositions: Other brand (NOT Apple), please specify manufacturer and product type:

questions.question_text: Please specify what other feature(s) the salesperson demonstrated or had you test drive.
Which of the following features did the salesperson demonstrate or have you test drive?  Select all that apply.
propositions: How light and portable the Apple product is
How to browse or search the web
How to check or send email
How to post on social media sites like Facebook, Twitter, etc.
How to use photo or camera features
How easy it is to learn to use the Apple product features

questions.question_text:
Did the salesperson provide a demonstration or test drive of an Apple product?

Demonstration: The salesperson uses the Apple product to show you features.

Test Drive: The salesperson asks you to use the Apple product yourself to explore features. The salesperson must stay with you and provide some guidance on what to do.
If you received service from more than one salesperson, please think only of the salesperson who discussed or showed Apple product features as you answer the following questions.
Rate the salesperson’s knowledge of Apple products.
Explain your rating of the salesperson’s knowledge of Apple products.
If the salesperson spoke negatively about an Apple product or the Apple brand, what did they say?
If the salesperson spoke negatively about an Apple product or the Apple brand, what did they say?
Did the salesperson speak negatively about an Apple product or the Apple brand?
In general, did the salesperson’s comments suggest that an Apple Laptop is better, about the same, or worse than other brands?
If no, describe the questions that the salesperson could not answer.
Was the salesperson able to answer all of your questions about Apple products?  Answer “No” if the salesperson referred to a manual, written information, or another salesperson.
Specify “Other” - how did the salesperson respond to your concern on value?
How did the salesperson respond to your concern on value?  Select all that apply.
propositions: Apple product is not more expensive than other brands with the same features
Display is best on the market
AppleCare – includes warranty with technical support
Easier to use – easy to set-up and works right out of the box
Gives you access to iCloud services (wirelessly push content to your devices)
Apple product is secure and virus free
Apple operating system is superior, so it won’t crash or freeze
Processing power – apps and graphics work more quickly
Apple’s Mac App Store gives you easy access to free and paid apps for your Mac
Quality construction – Apple product will work and be useful for years (lasts longer)
Quality of design – thin, light, and elegant, streamlined look-and-feel

$eq: Apple product is not more expensive than other brands with the same features
Display is best on the market
AppleCare – includes warranty with technical support
Easier to use – easy to set-up and works right out of the box
Gives you access to iCloud services (wirelessly push content to your devices)
Apple product is secure and virus free
Apple operating system is superior, so it won’t crash or freeze
Processing power – apps and graphics work more quickly
Apple’s Mac App Store gives you easy access to free and paid apps for your Mac
Quality construction – Apple product will work and be useful for years (lasts longer)
Quality of design – thin, light, and elegant, streamlined look-and-feel

questions.question_text: What other accessories did the salesperson suggest?

Did the salesperson suggest any accessories for the Apple product? Select all that apply.

If no accessories suggested, select only the last option “None”.
propositions: External memory or flash drive (NOT Time Capsule)
Apple or Beats branded headphones or speakers (such as AirPods, Beats Solo)
Headphones or speakers (NOT Apple or Beats branded)
Time Capsule: an Apple wireless hard drive for back up with WiFi
Microsoft Office for Mac (Excel, Word, and Power Point)
App-enabled accessories:  accessories that are controlled by applications on iPad or iPhone

$eq: External memory or flash drive (NOT Time Capsule)
Apple or Beats branded headphones or speakers (such as AirPods, Beats Solo)
Headphones or speakers (NOT Apple or Beats branded)
Time Capsule: an Apple wireless hard drive for back up with WiFi
Microsoft Office for Mac (Excel, Word, and Power Point)
App-enabled accessories:  accessories that are controlled by applications on iPad or iPhone

questions.question_text: What other services did the salesperson suggest for the Apple product?

You indicated that the salesperson mentioned iCloud during the interaction. Which iCloud functions did the salesperson mention? Select all that apply.

If "None", select only the last option.
propositions: Update or add content (such as mail, contacts, calendars, photos) across all of your Apple devices
Share apps, music and other purchases with family members
Find Apple devices when they are lost
Store documents online and access them

questions.question_text:
Did the salesperson suggest any services for the Apple product? Select all that apply.

If no services suggested, select only the last option “None”.
propositions: App Store for iPad and iPhone
AppleCare Protection Plan: purchase Apple extended warranty coverage and technical support
Other warranty programs (NOT Apple branded): purchase extended warranty through retailer
Product training for customers (individual training or workshops)
Product set up services: transfer data from your current device

$eq: App Store for iPad and iPhone
AppleCare Protection Plan: purchase Apple extended warranty coverage and technical support
Other warranty programs (NOT Apple branded): purchase extended warranty through retailer
Product training for customers (individual training or workshops)
Product set up services: transfer data from your current device

questions.question_text: Specify “Other” - how did the salesperson respond?

If the MacBook was not in stock, how did the salesperson respond to your request? Select all that apply.

If the salesperson took no action, select only the last option “No action taken by the salesperson”.
propositions: Offered a different Apple product that is in stock
Told when they expected to have more stock
Offered to contact you when stock is available
Offered to check other stores for stock
Offered to order it for you
No action taken by the salesperson

$eq: Offered a different Apple product that is in stock
Told when they expected to have more stock
Offered to contact you when stock is available
Offered to check other stores for stock
Offered to order it for you
No action taken by the salesperson

questions.question_text: Was the MacBook in stock? This can be any MacBook model.
Please specify what the salesperson did at the end of the interaction.
If the salesperson did none of the above, describe how the interaction ended.

At the end of the interaction, did the salesperson do any of the following? Select all that apply.

If the salesperson did not do any of the following, select only the last option “None of the above”.
propositions: Asked if you were ready to purchase today
Offered information on another Apple product to help you decide
Summarized your needs and matched them to the Apple product recommended
Shared a personal / customer's story about the Apple product to reassure you about your purchase
Asked if you had any further questions
Gave information on price, payment options, or finance offers
Invited you back for more information or another demonstration or test drive
Gave you their business card or contact information

$eq: Asked if you were ready to purchase today
Offered information on another Apple product to help you decide
Summarized your needs and matched them to the Apple product recommended
Shared a personal / customer's story about the Apple product to reassure you about your purchase
Asked if you had any further questions
Gave information on price, payment options, or finance offers
Invited you back for more information or another demonstration or test drive
Gave you their business card or contact information

questions.question_text: Approximately how long was your interaction with the salesperson?
Please specify what other salesperson assisted you in the Apple Shop.

Describe what the Apple staff was wearing, including details on:
- shirt color
- shirt type (t-shirt, collared shirt, etc.)
- any logo or writing on the shirt
- any badge or name-tag
If an Apple salesperson was present but did not assist you, explain why you did not receive assistance from the Apple salesperson.
Was an Apple salesperson (wears shirt with Apple logo) present at any time during your visit?
Which salesperson assisted you in the Apple Shop? Select all that apply.
propositions: Apple staff – wears shirt with Apple logo
Staff representing other brands – wears badge or uniform of another brand

$eq: Apple staff – wears shirt with Apple logo
Staff representing other brands – wears badge or uniform of another brand

questions.question_text: Explain "yes"
Are there any other details to share from your visit that have not already been covered in other questions?
